info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:02PM EST until January 12 at 3:49PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Halifax and Charlotte Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Roanoke River...including Randolph...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Dan River...including Paces, and South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water is several feet deep on portions of river road and black walnut road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 26.8 feet and falling. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM EST Thursday was 27.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.8 feet on 02/18/1903. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.Friday morning at 815 AM EST.
